empty-state.title: Create your first project configuration!
empty-state.message: Define your application needs as code and use Configurations to centralized your variables and secrets by environment.

repositories.non-admin-message: The configurations must be set up by the repo admin.

errors.contract-not-found: No contract file found at {filePath} on branch {branchName}

has-created-contract.has-created-contract-button-title: I already created my Symeo contract
has-created-contract.has-not-created-contract-button-title: I do not have a Symeo contract yet
has-created-contract.learn-more-message: To learn more about Symeo contracts, consult this

create-configuration-guided-form.repository-label: Select the project for which to create a configuration contract
create-configuration-guided-form.repository-message: Choose the repository hosting the code of the application you need to configure.
create-configuration-guided-form.branch-label: Choose the branch on which to commit the contract
create-configuration-guided-form.branch-message: Choose your main development branch, on which features are merged.

contract-messages.no-env-file: We created an example contract bellow. Edit it to match your needs.
contract-messages.one-env-file2: file in your repository and converted it to a Symeo contract. Edit it if needed.
contract-messages.multiple-env-files: We found multiple .env file in your repository. Choose the one you want to convert to Symeo contract.

contract-documentation.nesting: You can nest properties to any depth level

create-configuration-guided-form.contract-file-path-label: Choose where to commit your contract file
create-configuration-guided-form.contract-file-path-message1: Weâ€™ll commit the contract file on the
create-configuration-guided-form.name-label: Finally, give a name to your Configuration
create-configuration-guided-form.name-message: This is useful if your have multiple Configurations in the same repository

create-configuration-form.title: Set up configuration for {repositoryName}
create-configuration-form.config-contract-file-path-field-label: Path to your configuration contract file
create-configuration-form.branch-field-placeholder: On which branch should we find the file?
create-configuration-form.contract-help-message: Need help defining your contract? Follow documentation

errors.empty-name: You must provide a name for your configuration

delete.title: Delete this configuration
delete.message: Once you delete an configuration, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {configurationName} configuration, its environments, configuration values and its api keys.
confirm.button-label: I understand the consequences, delete this configuration

errors.empty-name: You must provide a name for your environment

role-messages.readNonSecret: Can view non secret values for the environment
role-messages.readSecret: Can view non secret and secret values for the environment
role-messages.write: Can view and edit all values for the environment
role-messages.admin: Can view and edit values, change permissions, create api keys, and delete the environment

api-keys.title: API Keys
api-keys.message: API Keys are unique to an environment. An API key is required to fetch your configuration from your application running environment.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete this api key?
confirm.message: Any applications or scripts using the "{key}" key will no longer be able to access this environment values. You cannot undo this action..
confirm.button-label: I understand, delete this api key

delete.title: Delete this environment
delete.message: Once you delete an environment, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {environmentName} environment, its configuration values and its api keys.
confirm.button-label: I understand the consequences, delete this environment

errors.unknown: An unknown error happened. Please try again later.
